Body:
I need to do a quantitative analysis to a medieval text. I need to get some basic information like the total number of the words, their frequencies and the concordances.

Does anyone know about a free Lexical Analyser software for Windows 7 to wor11 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/20n advance.
Title: Looking for a Free Lexical Analyser

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
